summary: One of the biggest Russian hits in years, this epic comedy shows how the largest country on the planet can come together on New Year's. (Russian with English subtitles)
cast: Dmitry Medvedev|Alina Bulynko|Sergey Pokhodaev|Ivan Urgant|Sergey Svetlakov|Elena Plaksina|Vera Brezhneva|Nikita Presnyakov|Boris Khvoshnyanskiy|Artur Smolyaninov|Sergey Garmash|Ekaterina Vilkova|Mariya Poroshina|Dato Bakhtadze|Olga Tumaykina|Galina Danilova|Oleg Filipchik|Sergey Druzyak|Kristina Asmus|Aleksandr Golovin|Aleksandr Domogarov|Galina Stakhanova|Viktor Verzhbitskiy|Baymurat Allaberiev|Konstantin Khabenskiy|Margarita Silkina|Pavel Melenchuk|Margarita Shubina|Irina Arkhipova|Konstantin Isaev|Konstantin Samoukov|Anna Voronova|Viktor Ivanov|Dmitriy Malashenko|Galina Anisimova|Irina Chipizhenko|Yuriy Moseychuk|Andrey Kislitsin|Olga Kravtsova|Egor Katkov|Tyoma Alyoshin|Aleksandr Arsentev|Aleksandra Fatkhi|Roman Mayakin|Egor Gavrilin|Ivan Gromov|Anton Anosov|Vasiliy Abdrashitov|Nikita Tarasov|Valentina Karpova|Vladimir Kebin|Adylbek Atykhaev|Danila Konstantinov|Mariya Simakina|Agata Koloyan|Denis Konstantinov|Oksana Dosekina|Marina Ruban|Nikita Korkin|Darya Rudenok|Sergey Shaydakov|Ivan Shevchenko|Anastasiya Maskaleva|Filipp Kotov|Ilya Sologub|Ekaterina Buslaeva|Anton Batarev

title: Yolki
